overview.proficient: You instead climb at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{normal speed}.

overview.base: You vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{quarter speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed}.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed}.

overview.base: Your @L[Equipment:Mouth]{mouth} counts as a @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with it and its damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].

system.limitation: Can only target creatures size 0.5 or smaller.

overview.base: You can see @L[Condition:Ethereal]{Ethereal} creatures and have @L[Core:Advantage]{advantage} on checks made with @L[Ability:Perceive]{Perceive}.

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Shields]{shields} for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Block Interaction]{block} with them and their @L[Core:Block Value]{BV} is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands @L[Property:Blocking]{blocking}.
You cannot use items in your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands}.

results.critHit: The target automatically fails the first [[/roll 2d4]] roll.

system.endCondition: At the end of each of the target's @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.
system.limitation: Can only target creatures size 0.5 or smaller.
